name: Space Madness (itch) (Sqeek Songplay)
description:
Space Madness is a somewhat-short (Around an hour, estimated) point&click adventure game in the style of classics such as Shadowgate and Uninvited.

You play as a Soviet Cosmonaut in 1962, stranded on the moon during the first lunar landing in human history!....Or so you had thought. 

Explore the surface of the moon and search for what you need in order to return back to Earth in one piece. 

My first ever foray into the Point&click genre, and first time making all the art myself, I feel I properly captured the vibe of 1980's PC and NES games.

(Credit to the music goes to Incompetech's royalty-free library)
